typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['sandbox/user/zbmhpw/source/']) ~> YieldSource
ECIDReworkRank select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!="lot_key"&&name!="rework_flag"),
			regexReplace($$," ","_") = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExtraction
YieldSource derive(ECID = iif(
    isNull(toString(byName('DLT_LOC (1=GRESHAM) TAG'))), 'EMPTY',
    concat("G", iif(toInteger(byName('DLT_YR (8=2017 - 9=2018 - ETC) TAG')) == 12, 
        concat("AY", 
            concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_WEEK TAG')) + 100), 2)),
                concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_LOT TAG')) + 1000), 3), 
                    concat("-", 
                        concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_WAFER TAG')) + 100), 2), 
                            concat(":", 
                                concat(toString(byName('DLT_X TAG')),
                                    concat(":", toString(byName('DLT_Y TAG'))))))))), 
        concat("AW", 
            concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_WEEK TAG')) + 100), 2)),
                concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_LOT TAG')) + 1000), 3), 
                    concat("-", 
                        concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_WAFER TAG')) + 100), 2), 
                            concat(":", 
                                concat(toString(byName('DLT_X TAG')),
                                    concat(":", toString(byName('DLT_Y TAG')))))))))))
),
		Fab_Wafer = iif(
    isNull(toString(byName('DLT_LOC (1=GRESHAM) TAG'))), 'EMPTY',
    concat("G", iif(toInteger(byName('DLT_YR (8=2017 - 9=2018 - ETC) TAG')) == 12, 
        concat("AY", 
            concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_WEEK TAG')) + 100), 2)),
                concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_LOT TAG')) + 1000), 3), 
                    concat("-", right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_WAFER TAG')) + 100), 2)))), 
        concat("AW", 
            concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_WEEK TAG')) + 100), 2)),
                concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_LOT TAG')) + 1000), 3), 
                    concat("-", right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_WAFER TAG')) + 100), 2))))))
),
		Fab_Lot = iif(
    isNull(toString(byName('DLT_LOC (1=GRESHAM) TAG'))), 'EMPTY',
    concat("G", iif(toInteger(byName('DLT_YR (8=2017 - 9=2018 - ETC) TAG')) == 12, 
        concat("AY", 
            concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_WEEK TAG')) + 100), 2)),
                concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_LOT TAG')) + 1000), 3), 
                    concat(".", "S"))), 
        concat("AW", 
            concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_WEEK TAG')) + 100), 2)),
                concat(right(toString(toInteger(byName('DLT_LOT TAG')) + 1000), 3), 
                    concat(".", "S")))))
),
		FTLot = case(
    right(toString(byName('Lot')), 2) == "SS", left(toString(byName('Lot')), length(toString(byName('Lot'))) - 2),
    right(toString(byName('Lot')), 1) == "S", left(toString(byName('Lot')), length(toString(byName('Lot'))) - 1),
    toString(byName('Lot'))
    ),
		ECID_Timestamp = add(toTimestamp(byName('start_time'), 'MM/dd/yyy HH:mm'), seconds(toInteger(byName('serial')))),
		PassDie = iif(toInteger(byName('STDF_SwBin'))==1, 1, 0)) ~> DerivedColumn1
SelectExtraction select(mapColumn(
		ECID,
		FTLot,
		ECID_Timestamp,
		ECID_Test_Pass,
		ECID_Rework,
		each(match(true()),
			replace($$,"(","") = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExtraction2
SelectExtraction2 select(mapColumn(
		ECID,
		FTLot,
		ECID_Timestamp,
		ECID_Test_Pass,
		ECID_Rework,
		each(match(true()),
			replace($$,")","") = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExtraction3
SelectExtraction3 select(mapColumn(
		ECID,
		Fab_Wafer,
		Fab_Lot,
		ECID_Timestamp,
		ECID_Test_Pass,
		ECID_Rework,
		FTLot,
		FTLotInsertion,
		PassDie,
		each(match(true()),
			replace($$,"=","") = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectionExtraction4
DerivedColumn1 rank(asc(FTLot, true),
	output(FTLotInsertion as long),
	dense: true) ~> FTLotInsertionRank
FTLotInsertionRank window(over(ECID),
	asc(ECID_Timestamp, true),
	ECID_Test_Pass = denseRank()) ~> ECIDTestPassRank
ECIDTestPassRank window(over(ECID),
	desc(ECID_Timestamp, true),
	ECID_Rework = denseRank()) ~> ECIDReworkRank
SelectionExtraction4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	filePattern:'outputParquetFile[n].parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		ECID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> YieldSink
